statements: UPDATE website_data SET page_url='homepage', interaction_type='click' WHERE user_id=12345 AND timestamp='2022-01-15 10:30:00';
UPDATE website_data SET ip_address='192.168.1.1', timestamp='2022-01-16 15:45:00', interaction_type='scroll' WHERE user_id=54321;
UPDATE website_data SET page_url = 'example.com/blog' WHERE user_id = 123 AND interaction_type = 'click';
UPDATE website_data SET timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
UPDATE website_traffic SET time_spent_seconds = 120 WHERE visitor_id = 1;
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_type = 'click' WHERE visitor_id = 2;
UPDATE website_traffic SET page_visited = 'home', time_spent_seconds = 120 WHERE visitor_id = 1;
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_type = 'click', interaction_data = '{"button_clicked": "submit"}' WHERE visitor_id = 2;
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_type='click', timestamp='2022-08-15 10:30:00' WHERE user_id=101
UPDATE customer_preferences SET preference_value='daily', timestamp='2022-08-16 08:45:00' WHERE customer_id=201
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_type='Like' WHERE user_id=100 AND page_visited='Home'
UPDATE customer_behavior SET action_type='Purchase', duration_seconds=3600 WHERE customer_id=200 AND timestamp='2022-01-15 10:30:00'
UPDATE website_visits SET page_visited='Homepage' WHERE user_id=123
UPDATE user_profiles SET age=30, location='New York' WHERE user_id=456
UPDATE website_visits SET page_visited='homepage' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE user_profiles SET email='newemail@example.com', age=30 WHERE user_id=100;
UPDATE user_accounts SET last_login = NOW() WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE website_visits SET time_spent = 60, page_visited = 'home' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE website_visits SET time_spent = 120 WHERE visit_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_details = '{"action": "clicked", "element": "button"}' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
